entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
